McKague, Saskatchewan

We have heard as many theories of how McKague got its name as there are residents of the town. Although the population is small, McKague is important to a lot of family member--especially those from John's line who are most closely connected to it. McKagues still live in the area today and it was the site of a family reunion of McKagues from western Canada. Click on the thumbnail for a closer view of any picture, then click on the "back" button on your browser to return to this page.
